description: Unique coral colony identifier (format: POC## e.g. POC61)
Change in coral surface area between December 2019 and May 2021 (negative values indicate shrinkage)
Change in coral volume between December 2019 and May 2021 (negative values indicate shrinkage)
Change in maximum coral height between December 2019 and May 2021 (negative values indicate shrinkage)
Change in interstitial volume between December 2019 and May 2021
Volume growth rate corrected for initial colony size
Habitat density treatment (1 = low/1 coral; 3 = medium/3 corals; 6 = high/6 corals per patch)
Reef location identifier within experimental site (format: Reef_Row-Column)
